name: THIEVES GUILD DECAPITATED!
text:
THIEVES GUILD DECAPITATED!

Today, the Bellman has some exclusive, shocking news for you! After careful investigation, our reporters have discovered an alarming pattern in a recent string of killings in popular Vvardenfell hangouts: all of the victims were ranking members of the Thieves Guild! While local authorities have not yet apprehended a suspect, our analysts suspect that the murders were a coordinated assault on the Guild by its longstanding rivals, the Camonna Tong. Nominally a society of "businessmer" championing Dark Elf interests, Camonna operatives smuggle chartered goods and slaves by the boatful, and casually murder anyone who might pose a threat to their criminal enterprise. With the comparatively restrained and principled Thieves' Guild decapitated, a dark cloud descends over the Imperial province of Morrowind as the Camonna Tong's brutality lowers the standards of decency even among criminals.
